Name: Glaze 3D
About the game: Glaze 3D is an easy and fun model repair and upgrade tool kit designed for hobbyist modelers looking to revamp old assets. Users will be able to generate creative textures, easily change materials, and export scenes as different file types. Please leave us feedback about our product to help improve it by filling out this survey: MAIN FUNCTIONALITIES: Display your scene using an advanced renderer. Use 20+ tools to edit and create textures including AI upscaling and noise texture generation. Update models to the industry standard material format (Principled BSDF) to enhance realism. Edit your scene so it can be imported accurately into your development engine of choice. Export high-res screenshots and videos of your scene to share with friends. Convert your model into the file type of your choice. Create 4 types of environment maps: cubemap, equirectangular, dual paraboloid, cross. Create cubemap textures from screenshots. FEATURES TO COME: Upgrade models and textures to modern PBR workflows. Bake material textures including normal, light, and ambient occlusion maps. Edit models with a variety of mesh tools. WHAT IS UNIQUE ABOUT OUR PRODUCT: A simple, user-friendly interface compared to other tools. It is fun for artists and creatives to transform old models into new creations. It has a higher range of model and texture files that it can import and export. It makes saving generated textures easy without needing a complex baking process. SUPPORTED FILE TYPES: Models: .obj, .fbx, .gltf, .dae, .3ds, and many more Textures: .png, .jpg, .jpeg, .dds, .bmp, .tiff, .tif, .pbm, .ppm, .pgm Video: .mp4, .mov, .divx, .avi, xvid, .mjpg, .x264, .wmv1, .wmv2 MODEL/TEXTURE CREATIVE COMMONS ATTRIBUTION: Battle Damaged Sci-fi Helmet - PBR by [theblueturtle_] Computer #3 by sudreyskr Door with frame by witnessk Flight Helmet by Microsoft Fireplace by Mark Bai Folded Newspaper by abdillaamy Indoor Plant 02 Fbx by whiskascaty34 Lamp 01 by Ernesto Bezera Morgan Arm Chair Blue - 10120 by Zuo Modern Persian Rug by Nicholas Record Sand 007 texture by João Paulo (katsukagi) (/) Sci_fi_Metal_Panel_001 texture by João Paulo Sofa grey fabric by charles.cla Square Truss Segment 21 by akerStudio Sibenik by Marko Dabrovic Tristennoeckel by Shahriar Shahrabi Vasco-B Coffee Table by Digital_MHC Vintage Metal Ashtray by Mattyew
